pkgmetadata.longdescription: Flask Boilerplate Utilities================================================For use in `Flask-Boilerplate <https://github.com/nickw444/Flask-Boilerplate>`_. however very useful as a standalone package for use within Flask apps.This module is part of the flask-boilerplate project.- `flask-boilerplate <https://github.com/nickw444/Flask-Boilerplate>`_- `flask-boilerplate-buildutils <https://github.com/nickw444/flask-boilerplate-buildutils>`_- `flask-boilerplate-utils <https://github.com/nickw444/flask-boilerplate-utils>`_- `maketools <https://github.com/nickw444/python-maketools>`_Installation------------------------------------.. code-block:: bashpip install flask-boilerplate-utilsUsage-----------------------------------.. code-block:: python from flask import Flask from flask_boilerplate_utils import Boilerplate() app = Flask(__name__) Boilerplate(app)Full usage available at `read the docs <http://flask-boilerplate-utils.readthedocs.org/en/latest/>`_
